text: Crash Bash (or Crash Bandicoot Carnival in Japan) is the fifth video game for the Crash Bandicoot series. In this game, a variety of mini-games are available for the player to play. The warp rooms were brought back here. == Release dates == === PlayStation === :North America: November 6, 2000 :Europe: December 1, 2000 :Japan: December 14, 2000 === PlayStation Network === :Japan: March 21, 2008 :Australia: October 31, 2009 Category:2000 video games Category:PlayStation games Category:Crash Bandicoot (video game series)
title: Crash Bash
